title.narrative: F.a: Self-organizing and Leaders Building for Grassroots Workers

description.narrative: The project enhances Pearl River Delta?s migrant workers self-organizing in Shenzhen and Dongguan provinces. Organizing is strengthened through trainings, documenting the struggles of migrant workers struggles to defend their rights by bringing them public and using the cases as examples of advocacy and research. Co-operation of workers centers operating in mainland China will be improved by strengthening their co-operation and mutual support to each other.China's labor markets are undergoing major changes due to the economic restructuring processes and as a result spontaneous industrial actions of migrant workers to respect their rights will continue. The government response to sudden strikes and freely elected representatives of workers is interfering of w orkers? trade union activities, illegal detentions, as well as dispersion of demonstrations. Civil society organizations supporting migrant workers seek to take maximum publicity and turn public opinion to workers' side from collective actions since only t hrough the media migrant workers without legal rights right can promote their cause.As a result of the project self-organizing of migrant workers increases and they know how to claim their rights from the employers and the state authorities.The beneficiari es of the project are migrant workers of Pearl River Delta.
